thread.title: good Hotel, Nice neighborhood and very nice staff
thread.title_full: good Hotel, Nice neighborhood and very nice staff - Review of Hotel Val Girard, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Samer K
title: good Hotel, Nice neighborhood and very nice staff
text:
It needs half an hour from Paris Nord, the north train station, by bus; (2 euros) for a person. Of Course you can always take the Subway and for that I recomend the daily ticket (11 euros) for person and you can also use it for busses; it's much cheaper if you plan on going places on your first day.
The hotel itself is not big, nor the rooms in general but they are tidy, well lit and the bed sheets are clean. the bathroom is small but it does what it's supposed to do very efficiently.
The staff are really nice and helpful.
The only bad point was the minibar, it had few things and it didn't work, I hope they fix that because everything else was very good.
